famous_people_last_speakings.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
famous_people_last_speakings.last_speaking: Ben, make sure you play 'Take My Hand, Precious Lord' in the meeting tonight. Play it real pretty.

famous_people_last_speakings.name: Albert Einstein
famous_people_last_speakings.last_speaking: I want to go when I want. It is tasteless to prolong life artificially. I have done my share, it is time to go. I will do it elegantly.

famous_people_last_speakings.name: Marilyn Monroe
famous_people_last_speakings.last_speaking: Say goodbye to Pat, say goodbye to Jack and say goodbye to yourself, because you're a nice guy.

famous_people_last_speakings.name: Elvis Presley
famous_people_last_speakings.last_speaking: I'm going to the bathroom to read.

famous_people_last_speakings.name: Steve Jobs
famous_people_last_speakings.last_speaking: Oh wow. Oh wow. Oh wow.
